name: TheWineConnoisseur
0:
”Alexa, open the Wine Connoisseur”
”Tell me a Wine Fact”
”What do you know about Wine”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the wine connoisseur
des:
The Wine Connoisseur will allow you to become the difference between a Wine Amateur and a Wine Expert with over 40 fun facts! 

Will work with all Amazon Alexa Products worldwide.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
